评论详情: So stinkin cuttte!! It's a must have! True to size. Love love love.
Bought this as a gift for my partner's son. Very cute. Perfect length. We lovebthe corset lacing!
Great fit!
This is the size I usually buy for a skirt. But it’s small.  And I’ve lost 30 lbs. hopefully it will fit when I keep losing weight.

This skirt was one of the best things I bought my granddaughter for Christmas. She had it on her list and I was a bit skeptical due to the 'mini' skirt taut. It was short but long enough to meet my concerns (as a grandma). The material is quite good. Thick but not too thick. Enough to make the skirt stand out and not just hang down. It went with a myriad of the tshirts she got and even a nice blouse she got. Very good item. In fact I will probably look for more in different colors.
Love this skirt!!

This skirt and this company is absolute garbage. I bought this as a Christmas gift for my teenager. I ordered a medium and they sent a small. The package says “M”, while the skirt clearly shows “S”. It is so small it would barely fit my 9yo. The material is also definitely not cotton. It feels like thin felt that you can put your finger through. It’s so thin that it’s see-through! I cannot believe how much they charge for this. Between the very poor quality, wrong product being sent and wonky sizing, stay away!

This item is a XL I’m 5”2 I’m 170 and it’s tight around my waist  so you might want to size up also it is super thin will not keep you warm ladies keep this in mind this item is short in the back so don’t bend over 😐 if you’re expecting stretch not it
Cute fall skirt. Goes great with a long sleeve crop top. I'm 5'1" 113lbs, size small fits perfectly.
This is adorable! It is comfortable. If doesn't peel or fade after being washed. I get tons of compliments on it every time I wear it. I want to get it in several colors.

Perfect length and sized perfectly. As someone who is on the taller side skirts generally are too short in the  back, this one fits perfectly especially for someone plus-sized. I  remove the lacing before washing so I haven't had any issues with it regarding washing so that would be my recommendation to avoid any potential issues
I'm a medium, but always order one size bigger. I ordered a large. The tag on the dress says large. But it's like the size of a small, it won't even go past my upper legs.
Good quality.
Too small

I needed a skirt and this is the only one guaranteed to arrive on time, so I grabbed this one thinking it was cute enough. And it does look like the picture HOWEVER the material is so thin it's see through even with the dark green color. If you have bigger hips or a bigger bum this isn't the skirt for you. It's a bit small in the waist. I would definitely size up if you do decide to go ahead with it. I don't have a lot of confidence in the zipper. The skirt is unwearable unfortunately.

I am not sure what chemical was used on this when it was packaged, but it had an absolutely horrid smell to it. I spent more time washing it and trying to get the smell out than wearing it.  The actual skirt fit well for what I wanted and was quite comfortable!

评论用户: I never received the item and money was deducted from my account . I feel so bad about it
评论详情: Great
The fabric was easy to wrinkle, the length was too short, and it felt stiff. If this were a piece for a costume it could work really well, but it is not suitable for every day use.
Love the way I look dressed as a schoolgirl as I'm in proper position as i get railed repeatedly with my machine taking 14 inch like the school slt

I was excited to receive this skirt but was completely let down. First, it looks nothing like the photo—total sham! The sizing is way off. I typically wear an XL, but I ordered a 2XL just to be safe, knowing some Amazon clothing can run small. Despite this, what arrived could barely pass for a small! The length was super short, and it was impossible to wear comfortably. To make matters worse, the fabric was thin and felt very cheap. It’s overpriced and not worth it at all. Even if the sizing wasn’t an issue, the material alone makes it not worth the price tag. This skirt is a scam—do not buy unless you want to be disappointed.
The skirt is adorable and beautiful but to be honest after pulling the zipper up it will just split open and you can’t even pull the zipper down after that. Basically ruining the skirt
The material is really thin and you can see through the skirt.

It's a light fabric so I recommend wearing short under it. I returning this one because it fits a little snug and with the flimsy zipper I am scared to bust it. I am on the heavier size and this one rolls around my waist and it does not look flattering so hopefully the larger size wont do the same. Otherwise it is super cute and great for warm weather.  4-stars mostly cuz the zipper seems finicky

I ended up returning this skirt.  While it did look like the photos, it was made of like...bandana material and was very see through.  You couldn't see my shorts underneath it per se, but you DEFINITELY knew where my legs are.  I will be searching for a different skirt made of thicker, better material

This skirt is very cute and the perfect skirt for a Harry Potter, Slytherin bound, However, it is completely see-through. I had to wear a black tennis skirt underneath. So just plan on wearing something underneath if you buy it because it is cute.
Very cute and fits perfectly! Not too short or too long.

I plan on buying another one of these skirt's in a different color because I love the style and fit so much. It is extremely flattering, and as a plus sized and pear shaped person I find it hard to find things that don't feel snug in the wrong places. The skirt has a slick material that makes it easy to clean, but a bit scratchy to wear directly against the skin. Its a lightweight material so it doesn't make me hot to wear layers with it, and the material is thick enough to not be see through. I spent my second time ever wearing it to a 7 hour long concert, as well as walked 3-4 miles in it the same day and it didn't make me too hot to keep wearing it, but I could tell that if I didn't have a shirt tucked into it that the material would have hurt my skin during that time. The corset part works nicely, and there is some extra elastic to give extra stretch and comfort around the waist with or without tightening the ribbons. I suggest completely removing the ribbon when machine washing it, because it will come undone and tangle up with other clothes. I can get into the skirt easily without having to use the zipper (I'm a B cup), but if you have large breasts and would need to unzip do so with caution! The zipper seems fragile and if tugged too harshly I can see it breaking.

Literally cannot express enough how much I love this skirt! It's so flattering and the perfect fabric weight, flowing so pretty! I especially love the ribbon-corset front. Snatches the waist so perfectly. It's so comfy, too. Bought it in the pink plaid as seen in the video and plain black. May come back to buy more variants!  My only complaints are how tough it is to get the zipper to move, making it feel as though I may break it if I try too hard, and hoping the quality of the product lasts. I can never be too sure. I've only worn it once so far, but you never know.  Overall, definitely think it's worth it, especially if you have a cute outfit in mind!
Great quality, true to size, but there is no stretch to this fabric at all, so maybe size up!

The fabric is so cheap, like a Halloween costume. Not to mention it runs too big. The price is outrageous for something of this quality. I wouldn't pay $5 for this skirt, so don't waste your time or money!
Bought for my daughter who is a size L, but it needed to be taken up a size. Beautiful skirt, as advertised. Soft fabric and hangs well.
I wear a smaller size than I bought this on and this is not even able to be zipped up. It's very short, too.
Not true to size
Runs small
the first one i bought the zipper broke. i re purchased because it was too cute and so far no issues! thankfully!
The M suze is more line small, and it is a zipper closer and not drawstring. The so called draw mstring is just for decoration.

So there are a few things about this skirt. The material is very light and thin, not see through but thinner than I expected. Also because it is so thin it doesn't have enough stiffness to flare out like in the picture. It falls more straight down than flaring out. It doesn't have any stretch but I would go with the size you normally wear. After reading comments about the lack of stretch I went for a larger size when I would normally go for the medium. I sit between sizes normally. The skirt is too big and I am gonna need to alter it now. Also if you have short legs this skirt will be just a few inches off of your knee. The front is just decorative so if you wanted it to cinch it won't hold up well. Otherwise it is nice. The color was spot on and I don't see any issues in the construction.

Love the skirt but sad to see the fabric have a slight tear on my second wear. The fabric holding the ribbons and loops doesn't seem to be sewn well. Either certain areas were missed or the design needs to be modified.  The front of the skirt is for aesthetic but you can adjust the ribbon or change it if you like. There's a zipper on the side and there's no pockets. I ordered an XL so I can have extra room for breathing, coverage and be comfortable. Overall the value and quality of the skirt is still good.

When I received it, the general quality was poor and the ribbon is quite horrible. If you keep the skirt, you must remove and wash then relace it after washing every time due to the flimsy material. This is better for a cosplay or something, not as an actual skirt.
No closure on pouch. Fake zipper. 130 lbs small too small med too big

评论概述: Good condition, decent quality, cute and the pocket fits my phone :D
评论详情: Came in good condition, fabric quality was also decent, the pocket fits my phone nicely, looks cute, was a bit wrinkly but that’s to be expected with any clothing ordered on amazon really. They initially sent me the wrong size so i had to return and reorder, they sent me the right size this time. Fits on me kinda high waisted, if you wanna wear it lower maybe order a size up.

Works great for me, the zipper works nicely, nice fabric. Not too large. Not too short. Thick fabric. Appearance is nice. Would reccomend to a friend.
Daughter loves the skirt she wears it slot
I love this skirt! It’s the perfect concert skirt with the clip on purse. I love not have to care a bag all night!!
Brought this for a costume party and the outfit was so cute! Everyone loved vibe! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Scrunches terribly in the front if you try to lace it
评论详情: Zipper is tough to zip, snags easily and feels like it'll break every time you use it. The lacing in the front scrunches the entire skirt if you try to tie it to fit your waist, and the skirt is far boxier than depicted.

I love this skirt. It does a great job at holding together the midsection and then flowing out at the bottom so that you have shape and don't look like an oval. It is very good quality too, not cheap fabric.
No matter how many times I double knot it, the ribbon comes undone. The color is good, it’s comfortable and light, and it was worth the price, but the ribbon just annoys the heck out of me
This is a gift.  It looks just like the picture and I am pleased with it.
I felt so cute wearing this and it was super comfortable!
Skirt is shorter than pictured. Has a stretchy waistband on the back, the photos on the ad clearly does not. I didn’t bother trying it on.
I bought this for an Irish occasion.  Just right and an excellent price, and washable.

评论概述: Cute and decent quality for the price
评论详情: I really like the shape and length of this skirt and it’s super easy to style. I would definitely check the size chart and order based on that because I am usually a small or medium in my other clothes but I ordered the small and it is very loose around my waist (i have it tied as tight as possible and safety pinned in the back in the pic and it’s still a bit loose) so I’m going to reorder an xs. Overall pretty good value for the money. The lace up part looks a bit cheap but otherwise it’s really cute.
When it had came in, my wife was excited to recieve it.  When she tried it on she told it was comfortable. I myself thought she looked beautiful in it

评论概述: Just what I was looking for.

I love this skirt. If there was a color in white, I'd buy another (let's be honest, I'm probably gonna buy another one anyway). Goes well with anything and looks great.

This is what I'm used to an XL fitting like, a large is too big for me. I would size down if you want the skirt. Other than that I love it! I don't have time to exchange it, so I'll just get mine tailored.
Was a lot longer than expected which is good. However, the sizing was a little too big. Ordered a large, should have went with a medium.

评论概述: Bad fit for big thighs and small waist
评论详情: Loved the style but the large was too big in the waist and too short in the length. So I tried the medium, which fit the waist but was still too short in the length. If you don't mind flashing big thighs (or don't have them), it's a cute skirt with a nice swirl. Good color selection.
The style is different and cute for my granddaughter loves it
I'm a bigger guy, 6ft and 290 pounds. This skirt fits me. Good stretch and length, and looks cute too.

评论用户: I really wanted to love these pants. They're very well made, sturdy fabric, but they feel like work pants when I was expecting cute pants lol.... They also fit Very big and are weirdly loose in the crotch to the point they fit more like mens pants. For what they are I'd probably give them 4.5 stars, but for what I thought I ordered maybe 3.
评论概述: Visible elastic in the back of the skirt
评论详情: I have such a hard time doing this review... this skirt is adorable and I will definitely wear it a lot, However: it has two inch thick elastic in the back which is visible on the outside when you wear it. The pictures did not show the elastic as visible. Now it's possible this is only the case in the bigger plus sizes, I did get a 2XL. But this means that I will never wear this skirt with a shirt tucked in because I personally do not like the elastic look. I do like the skirt, but this drastically limits my styling options and I might have gotten a different skirt if I had known going in.

评论概述: The skirt itself is super cute but the zipper is atrocious

It's an otherwise adoable and soft skirt too. I'm gonna replace it to see if that helps but if that one also has an awful zipper then I'm just gonna have to refund it completely.

The skirt being thin out of a naturally warm fabric didn’t bother me. It’s true to size. I purchased a medium and it fits very well. I didn’t think pulling the draw straps in the front would matter but it does work very nicely to gather
My child loves the skirt.
Order a few sizes bigger. Went by measurements and still didn't fit.

This skirt fit me fine and I sized up. I usually wear a large and I bought an XL and it fits perfectly. This skirt has not stretch whatsoever and the zipper isn’t the best quality. I felt like the zipper might break before I even got it on.
Very stretchy material. Comfortable and modest length. 😌
This skirt was true to size and fit amazingly.
This fits perfectly and great quality. My SO loves it on me.

I thought this was cute for my granddaughter but she didn’t like it.
I love it ! Adjustable waistband is nice too.
Made a great gift. Good quality material

Not so punk. Really a nice all occasion skirt. True to size. Nice stretch and strength in band. Flows and moves nicely. Much nicer than price and ad may indicate. Thinking about another color, easy care. Not real heavy but heavier, (nice) substance.
Super cute covers my butt which a major A+ Just a fair warning it has 0 stretch for the those who wanna know

This skirt doesn't have any stretch, so it's important to follow the size chart to make sure you get the right size. Though the lace front can be tightened though. The ribbon is a little slippery so it sometimes comes untied, which I have to keep my eye on, but a double knot deals with that. Every time it goes through the laundry the ribbon will get messed up, so I have to address that before putting it on every time.  Despite these annoyances it's my new favourite skirt, I feel super elegant in it. I receive compliments regularly.
very pretty soft
Very pretty I love the design of the skirt and that the waist is adjustable. It fit me well length wise and I do have to tighten the waist part but its easy to do
this is the first thing with absolutely no complaints. i mean quality isnt the best but its amazon. 10/10 would buy again
A little thinner fabric than expected and I actually wore it backwards so the ties were not in the front. It’s a cute skirt. Kind of short, too. Have to wear something under in case of a breeze.
Super cute but bigger than I was expecting. Went by size chart and ended up returning. Could have used a size smaller

Skirt is ok, thin and kinda stiff, I wear large and ordered large but should have gotten medium. Hips 40inches waist 32inches and the size large sits right above my hips, too big for waist.

I wore this in New Orleans for a fun trip; the skirt is not particularly stretchy, but it fit exactly as expected.  I'm 6 feet tall and weigh between 155-160.  I got the large; my measurements are 39/32/41 so it fit perfectly.  I love this skirt! :)

I’m 5,9 and about 165 lbs. I got an XL and it JUST fits me. It’s the perfect size, but I’m usually a medium/large in the high waisted sizes. It's perfect, not too thin but not really thick. Flows perfectly so it hides the stomache nicely too. I got an xl but could go a size up for more comfort.
